all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
For have I not the fowls of heaven, and also the fish of the sea, and the beasts of the mountains? Have I not made the earth? Do I not hold the destinies of all the armies of the nations of the earth?
Doctrine and Covenants 117:6
Quote of the Day
"Don’t hide from those who will love and support you; rather, run to them."
Elder Scott D. Whiting | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
